posts.post_title: For Trade - 1887 OJ - GEORGE PINKNEY - PSA 2
posts.post_content:
1887 Old Judge - George Pinkney - PSA 2

Looking to trade for another OJ that I need, similar condition... or...
I would trade for almost any group of 3 OJ beaters!

[img]http://caimages.collectors.com/psaimages/434/14306812/PINKNEY-GEORGE-2.jpg[/img]

If your interested in selling please email me at [url]gray766@hotmail.com[/url]
Thanks,
Mike Gray
